title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes or TC II merits in English Language and any three (3) of:

1. Economics

2. Accounts

3. Government

4. Geography

5. History

6. Business Method

7. Statistics

8. Commerce

9. Any Science subjects

 

NB: GROUP A:

Commercial Arithmetic Costing, Principles of Accounts, Book Keeping Mathematics, Statistics.

 

GROUP B:

Office Practice, Business Method, Commerce, Economics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any of Geography, Commerce and Principles of Accounts.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES / SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies and any other two (2) of Economics/Commerce, Government/History, Government/Social Studies.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies and any other of History/Government, Geography, Social Studies, Economics/Commerce.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/ENGLISH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies, Literature in English Language and Arts subject.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/HISTORY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies and any other  Arts subjects.
subjects: History, Christian Religious Studies and any other Arts subjects.

title: ECONOMICS/ENGLISH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Literature in English and any other Arts/Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, Literature in English and any other subject.

title: ECONOMICS/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Government/History and any other Social Science subject.
subjects: Economics, History/Government and any other Social Science subject.

title: ENGLISH/HISTORY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, History/Government and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Literature in English, History/Government and any other Arts subject

title: ENGLISH/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies, Literature in English and any other Arts subject.
subjects: Islamic Studies, Literature in English and one (1) Arts subject.

title: ENGLISH/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English, Government/History and any other Arts/Social Science subject.
subjects: Literature in English, Government/History and any other Arts/Social Science subject.

title: ENGLISH/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any two (2) of Economics, Government/History, Geography/Social Studies.
subjects: Literature in English and any of Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: HISTORY/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, History, Islamic Studies and any Arts subject.
subjects: History, Islamic Studies and any other Arts subject.

title: HISTORY/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, History and any two (2) Social Science subjects.
subjects: History and any two (2) Social Science subjects.

title: HISTORY/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, History and any two (2) of Geography, Government, Economics and Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies.
subjects: History and any one (1)  Arts and one (1)  Social Science subject.

title: ISLAMIC STUDIES/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies and any two (2) of

1. Economics

2. Government/History

3. Geography
subjects: Islamic Studies, Government/History and any one (1)  Social/Arts Subject.

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History, Islamic Studies and any one (1)  Arts/Social Science subject.
subjects: Government/History, Islamic Studies and one (1)  Arts/Social Science subject.

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History and two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Government/History and two (2) of Social Science subjects.

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION STUDIES
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.
